Text: Site Top Picks A New Years Resolution for You bytes January Hello Mark Make any resolutions for the New YearIve got one for youNow repeat after me I will be more spontaneous I will have more fun I will indulge my whims my desires my sense of adventure I will do it todaySounds a lot better than going to the gym or giving up chocolate doesnt it So do it this weekend a threeday weekend for many I might add and save No excuses No regrets And even more great deals to be had atSitecom
